Text: It was inspiring to hear from the Rt Hon Baroness@Jacqui_Smith1,@andrewpakes_,@NeilDotObrien, and the Rt Hon Sir Lindsay Hoyle,@CommonsSpeaker, on the importance of apprenticeships and the achievements of the brilliant apprentices in the room.#NAW2025#SkillsForLife(3/3)

City & Guilds is proud to sponsor four of these awards, and it was fantastic to celebrate the national finalists today, as well as some of the outstanding apprenticeship provision across the sector.#NAW2025#SkillsForLife(2/3)

@cityandguildsrun free webinars and events throughout the year to ensure customers are supported at every stage, from curriculum planning to ongoing delivery.Check out their upcoming events:https://bit.ly/3TIp00w#EAL
